Uses of Package
de.lessvoid.nifty

  • Packages that use de.lessvoid.nifty 
    Package Description
    de.lessvoid.nifty
    Provides the public classes for Nifty representing the public Nifty API.
    de.lessvoid.nifty.node
    Standard NiftyNodes
    de.lessvoid.nifty.spi.node  
  • Classes in de.lessvoid.nifty used by de.lessvoid.nifty 
    Class and Description
    Nifty
    The main control class of all things Nifty.
    NiftyCallback
    This is used as a parameter wherever Nifty needs to call user code.
    NiftyCanvas
    This can be used to draw.
    NiftyFont 
    NiftyImage
    A image that can be rendered into a NiftyCanvas or that can be used as a background image for a NiftyNode.
    NiftyNodeBuilder
    A fluent API to help building the NiftyNode structure.
    NiftyNodeCallback
    This is used as a parameter wherever Nifty needs to call user code.
    NiftyState.NiftyStandardState 
    NiftyStatistics
    Several different statistical informations about Niftys internal processing.
    NiftyStatistics.FrameInfo
    A FrameInfo instance records sample times for a specific frame.
    NiftyStatisticsMode
    The different modes of displaying statistics for rendering.
    UnitValue
    The UnitValue class stores and manages a value with an optional unit.
  • Classes in de.lessvoid.nifty used by de.lessvoid.nifty.node 
    Class and Description

    Created by void on 27.08.15.
  • Classes in de.lessvoid.nifty used by de.lessvoid.nifty.spi.node 
    Class and Description
    NiftyCanvas
    This can be used to draw.
    NiftyLayout
    This is the class that supports the layout nodes to do their work.
